CHAT.comment: Chi decides to write to Santa Claus; good-natured interaction between Mot and Chi throughout; Mot very didactic , quizzing Chi about pronunciation and spelling out parts of harder words when Chi asks; interrupted by doorbell at end
Dear Santa Claus , I want you to get me a power wheel and accordian to! Love , Chi [= full name]

u.a: erases small c and writes capital c
sounding out to show why she had put an h in want
Chi started to spell wheels without h
points to word to help Chi fill in remaining letters
indeed , it should be an o
asks EXPs if they want to shut tape off for a minute (they do); context notes say Chi finishes letter (signs) as Mot goes to answer door
